fullplot: The movie will cover the life of Camarèn de la Isla (Jaenada), the legendary Spanish flamenco cantaor, from his beginning until his death. It tells around the relationships Camarèn de la Isla struck up with people such as his wife La Chispa (Sènchez) and guitarists Paco de Lucèa, Tomatito and Paco Cepero.
